CMS-DS-PDM-01.title: Content Management & Design Systems Product Leader
CMS-DS-PDM-01.summary: Product manager specializing in headless CMS, enterprise design systems, and structured content architecture for global, multi-brand ecosystems. I bridge UX, engineering, and content to build platforms where teams can design, ship, and evolve digital products with clarity and speed. My work centers on composable systems, multi-surface content delivery, and Al-supported workflows, helping organizations scale with reusable components, flexible schema design, and opinionated tooling. I thrive in ambiguous, systems-heavy environments where shaping foundational capabilities unlocks creativity across the entire product organization.

DS-CMS-PDM-01.title: Design Systems & Content Management Product Leader
DS-CMS-PDM-01.summary: Seasoned Product Leader with expertise in headless CMS, PIM, DAM, and design system implementation for enterprise e-commerce ecosystems. Proven track record of driving digital transformation, enhancing content operations, and delivering exceptional user experiences through systems thinking, cross-functional collaboration, and strategic vision.

CMS-DS-PDM-02.title: Content Management & Design Systems Product Leader
CMS-DS-PDM-02.summary: Product manager specializing in headless CMS, enterprise design systems, and structured content architecture for global, multi-brand ecosystems. I bridge UX, engineering, and content to build platforms where teams can design, ship, and evolve digital products with clarity and speed. My work centers on composable systems, multi-surface content delivery, and Al-supported workflows, helping organizations scale with reusable components, flexible schema design, and opinionated tooling. I thrive in ambiguous, systems-heavy environments where shaping foundational capabilities unlocks creativity across the entire product organization.

PM-PDM-CMS-ECOM-01.title: Project & Product Management, CMS & E-Commerce
PM-PDM-CMS-ECOM-01.summary: Project Manager specializing in complex content migrations, multi-quarter digital programs, and large-scale CMS implementations. Skilled at coordinating globally distributed teams, structuring timelines, and driving cross-functional alignment across marketing, engineering, IT, legal, and operations. Known for building clear project plans, managing dependencies, mitigating risks early, and keeping stakeholders informed with consistent, actionable communication. Experienced in leading content workflows across enterprise CMS, DAM, and knowledge platforms, ensuring smooth transitions during replatforming, redesigns, and large migration initiatives. Delivers stable, predictable execution in environments with shifting priorities and multiple business partners.

CMS-AI-PDM-01.title: Content, CMS & AI Product Leader
CMS-AI-PDM-01.summary: Product Leader specializing in content platforms, AI-driven optimization, and large-scale digital ecosystems. Proven track record implementing headless CMS, design systems, and modular content architectures for enterprise e-commerce brands. Expertise in driving SEO, GenAI Engine Optimization (GEO), prompt engineering, content automation, and structured metadata to improve discoverability across traditional search engines, emerging AI assistants, and app marketplaces. Strong cross-functional leader with deep experience in LLM-ready content architecture, semantic markup, and analytics-driven SEO strategy.

ECOM-CMS-DS-PDM-01.title: E-Commerce, CMS & Design Systems Product Leader
ECOM-CMS-DS-PDM-01.summary: Strategic Product Leader specializing in enterprise global e-commerce migrations (Shopify, CommerceTools), CMS (Contentful, Drupal), and design systems across multi-brand, multi-market organizations. Expert at driving large-scale replatforms, building repeatable rollout models, and leading change management, documentation, and training programs that ensure adoption across global teams. Proven ability to align product, engineering, design, and regional stakeholders to deliver scalable, API-driven commerce experiences at the enterprise level.

CMS-SEO-DS-PDM-01.title: Content, SEO, CMS & Design Systems Product Leader
CMS-SEO-DS-PDM-01.summary: Product Leader specializing in content platforms, AI-driven optimization, and large-scale digital ecosystems. Proven track record implementing headless CMS, design systems, and modular content architectures for enterprise e-commerce brands. Expertise in driving SEO, GenAI Engine Optimization (GEO), prompt engineering, content automation, and structured metadata to improve discoverability across traditional search engines, emerging AI assistants, and app marketplaces. Strong cross-functional leader with deep experience in LLM-ready content architecture, semantic markup, and analytics-driven SEO strategy.

slots.header: Led the architecture and delivery of enterprise content and design foundations for a global portfolio of prestige beauty brands.

variants.content: Led a two-year in-production innovation program that launched a luxury brand on a composable foundation, integrating a headless CMS, in-house commerce engine, and an enterprise design system (EDS) - validating the ecosystem later used to guide the enterprise migration to Shopify.
